• Pam Rosel

    • Folio About

    UAP

    It was very special to work with the behemoth creative that is UAP to make a website that celebrates their vibrant and extensive folio of public works around the world. The end result was an absolute beast of a site, carefully indexing tonnes of content through filtered searching, showcasing artistic collaborators, product collections and more. The entire site was also available in Mandarin for their growing international operations.

    • Urban Art Projects
    • Digital Rebrand
    • UI UX
    • Content Strategy
    • International Portfolio
    • Bilingual

    Hi my name is Pamela, I'm a designer and now developer who's been working in the space of digital design and branding for over 10 years.

    I have an open mind and I love a good challenge. My design practice spans across multiple disciplines because I enjoy the flexibility of doing it all and evolving with new technology, most recently in the areas of full-stack development and 3D. I've spent the last few years freelancing and starting my own projects within the local arts, music and film community in Meanjin, Brisbane. Fostering underground culture and community is at the centre of what I love to do.

    In Meanjin, I live, work and benefit from systems built on stolen Jagera and Turrbal land. Although still learning, I recognise and respect the eternal connection of First Nations people to country, culture and community in Australia. I believe this is important in upsetting cycles of the past and that we can move forwards together - with the kind of grace that could benefit and heal everyone in this country.
